titles: Examen de ingenios, or, The tryal of wits discovering the great difference of wits among men, and what sort of learning suits best with each genius / published originally in Spanish by Doctor Juan Huartes ; and made English from the most correct edition by Mr. Bellamy.
author: Huarte, Juan, 1529?-1588.
Bellamy, Mr. (Edward)
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
